@graph.name: Apple Monster Mouth Recipe
@graph.description: Apple Monster Mouths are one of the easiest and healthiest Halloween Treats to scare up a good time. Serve them at your next party!
recipeIngredient: ½ cup Peanut Butter (creamy peanut butter works best)
⅓ cup Sunflower Seeds (approximately 120 individual seeds)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and dry your apples and strawberries. Then, core and cut your apples into quarters. Slice your strawberries into think strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and dry your apples and strawberries. Then, core and cut your apples into quarters. Slice your strawberries into think strips.

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully cut a mouth shape in the center of a quarter of an apple. If you happen to go all the way through to the other side, that’s fine. The peanut butter usually covers it up.
recipeInstructions.name: Carefully cut a mouth shape in the center of a quarter of an apple. If you happen to go all the way through to the other side, that’s fine. The peanut butter usually covers it up.

recipeInstructions.text: Smear peanut butter on the inside of the cut apple (top and bottom). This doesn't have to be a thick layer, just enough to cover both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Smear peanut butter on the inside of the cut apple (top and bottom). This doesn't have to be a thick layer, just enough to cover both sides.

recipeInstructions.text: Place your strawberry tongue in the bottom center of the apple mouth. Then, push the sunflower seeds into the peanut butter and apple just hard enough to stay put. Now, take a dab of peanut butter and put it on the back of the candy eyes, and attach them to the top of the apple.
recipeInstructions.name: Place your strawberry tongue in the bottom center of the apple mouth. Then, push the sunflower seeds into the peanut butter and apple just hard enough to stay put. Now, take a dab of peanut butter and put it on the back of the candy eyes, and attach them to the top of the apple.
